scripts.clean: npm run clean:build && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json
scripts.debug: npm run lint && npm run clean:build && mkdir build && npm run static && npm run css && npm run js
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run clean:build && mkdir build && npm run static:min && npm run css:min && npm run js:min
scripts.buildWithoutLint: npm run clean:build && mkdir build && npm run static:min && npm run css:min && npm run js:min
scripts.static: cp Client/src/index.html build/index.html && cp Client/src/html/betreiber.html build/betreiber.html && cp Client/src/html/kunde.html build/kunde.html && cp Client/src/html/vorstellung.html build/vorstellung.html && cp Client/src/html/bestaetigung.html build/bestaetigung.html
scripts.static:min: npm run static && place build/index.html style.css style.min.css && place build/index.html main.js main.min.js && place build/betreiber.html style.css style.min.css && place build/betreiber.html main.js main.min.js && place build/kunde.html style.css style.min.css && place build/kunde.html main.js main.min.js && place build/vorstellung.html main.js main.min.js && place build/vorstellung.html style.css style.min.css && place build/bestaetigung.html main.js main.min.js && place build/bestaetigung.html style.css style.min.css
scripts.js:min: npm run js && terser build/main.js --compress --mangle --comments=false -o build/main.min.js
